Added_Input.name: FFlagCASButtonsOnWindowsTouch
Added_Input.mechanism: Enables touch-friendly buttons for the Character Appearance System on Windows devices.
Added_Input.purpose: Makes it easier for players using touch screens to customize their avatars.
